title: Good Omens - Leaving the garden, Part 2: The first snow
author: Skelligiri
comment:
Wait until this pops up in every Good Omens fan' recommendations. LikE mE
Also, this was so adorable! I loved how Crowley got time to make a snowman and a snow angel just before getting cold XD
I love how Azira is putting his wing around Crowley, they're the cutest
My heart... it's melting!! So adorable
This is so cute ! Can't wait for your other creations !
description:
Crowley and Aziraphale experiencing the very first snow fall together. 

This was part 2 of my 'Leaving the garden' series, which is a series of animations I plan on making this year (there are 3 of them at the time I'm uploading this video with a long one in the works, I post regular updates on my Tumblr at
